meta.title: Home Nursing Johan Liebens - Care at Home

hero.title: Home Nursing Johan Liebens
hero.subtitle: 15 years of reliable home care you can trust

general.title: General home care with a personal touch
general.description: Our team of experienced home nurses is dedicated every day to providing you with the best care at home. Empathy, commitment and humanity are central to our approach. A friendly word, a listening ear or a reassuring presence - that's what good care is all about.

woundCare.title: Customized wound care
woundCare.description: You can count on us for the care of all types of wounds. Our team has extensive experience with: • Burns • Pressure ulcers • Amputation wounds • Postoperative wounds • Oncological wounds Every treatment is done in consultation with your doctor, so we choose the best care strategy.

palliative.title: Palliative care with respect and humanity
palliative.description: Thanks to our years of experience, our team provides palliative care. This care is fully focused on comfort, peace and dignity. We respect the wishes of you and your loved ones. We take our time, listen and provide support where needed.

hygiene.title: Hygienic care with that little extra
hygiene.description: When daily care becomes difficult, we are ready with discrete and professional support. Our services include: • Help with washing and dressing • Daily hygienic care • Hair and ear care • Nail cutting • Body hydration So you feel comfortable and cared for in your own home.

nursing.title: Nursing procedures at home
nursing.description: We perform professional nursing procedures at your home: • Flushing of Port-a-cath • Bladder irrigations • Blood pressure measurement • Blood sampling with lab control • Filling medication boxes • Compression therapy • Infusion therapy • Administering medication • Administering eye drops Expert care in your familiar environment.

stoma.title: Specialized stoma care
stoma.description: Our team specializes in stoma care at home. We ensure proper and comfortable care of the stoma. If desired, we teach you how to care for the stoma yourself. This gives you more independence, with professional support within reach.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Home Nursing Johan Liebens is an experienced team of home nurses that has been providing quality home care for 15 years in the Kortenberg and Leuven region. We combine professional expertise with a personal and human approach, tailored to your needs. Our mission is clear: supporting people in their recovery and well-being, in their own familiar environment. Whether it concerns wound care, hygienic care, palliative care or stoma care - our team is ready every day with knowledge, care and respect. We believe that good care goes beyond medical procedures alone. That's why we take the time to listen and work together to find the best solution. Home Nursing Johan Liebens is available 24/7 - including weekends and holidays.

area.title: Our Service Area
area.description: Home Nursing Johan Liebens provides professional home care throughout Flemish Brabant. We visit you at home in the municipalities listed below and surrounding areas.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Home nursing is largely reimbursed by health insurance. The exact amount depends on your care needs and insurance. Feel free to contact us for a personal estimate - we're happy to help.
faq.q2: In which region are you active?
faq.a2: We are active in Kortenberg, Leuven, Bertem, Zaventem, Steenokkerzeel, Perk, Leefdaal, Herent, Kessel-Lo, Oud-Heverlee, Heverlee, Wilsele and all surrounding municipalities in Flemish Brabant.
faq.q3: Is home nursing available on weekends?
faq.a3: Yes, we are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. We are also available on weekends and holidays. You can always count on us.
faq.q4: What care does a home nurse provide?
faq.a4: Our home nurses provide wound care, palliative care, hygienic care, stoma care, blood sampling, infusion therapy, medication management, compression therapy and many other nursing procedures at home.
faq.q5: How do I request home nursing?
faq.a5: Very simple! Call us at 0471 92 05 81 or send an email to liebens.johan@telenet.be. A prescription from your doctor is often required for health insurance reimbursement. We're happy to guide you through the administration.
